name: Estimated demographic composition of job satisfaction classes: 2017
description: Estimated demographic composition of job satisfaction classes: 2017

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Class proportions in a row that do not share a letter are statistically different at the 0.005 level. Population proportions are provided for reference only. Class 1: Very Satisfied with Independence, Challenge, and Responsibility; Class 2: Very Satisfied with Everything; Class 3: Very Satisfied with Benefits; Class 4: Dissatisfied with Opportunities for Advancement; Class 5: Somewhat Satisfied with Everything.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Doctorate Recipients, 2017.
